content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Storage Area at Position (5.5, 0.5)
- Consists of a Wooden Chest at position (5.5, 0.5).

### Smelting Area at Position (15.0, 0.0)
- Consists of a Stone Furnace at position (15.0, 0.0) with a warning of 'no ingredients to smelt' and containing 8 copper plates.

### Material Transfer System at Position (17.5, 0.5)
- Consists of an Inserter at position (17.5, 0.5) which is not connected to a power network, intended to extract items from the furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure that you have crafted or acquired the necessary entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map.

### Errors due to insufficient materials for crafting
- Verify that you have all the required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors when extracting items from entities
- Confirm that the target entity contains the items you wish to extract before attempting the extraction.

### Errors when attempting to interact with non-existent entities
- Double-check the position and existence of entities on the map before attempting to interact with them.

### Errors due to entities not being connected to power
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to a power network to function correctly.
